title: Main Mid/ADC Dia 4 Looking for Team ( equal elo)
body:
Hey I'm currently Diamond 4 and looking for a 5v5 Team to play with. I'm playing since beginning S2.
I'm 19 y/o currently doing my A- Levels in Germany and play on the EUW Server. I'm very active, playing multiple games a day with the goal of improving not only climbing.
Your team should be able to speak English/German, absolutely non toxic and having fun even when tryharding. Also having the goal of participating on as many tournaments as possible. :)

If you are intrested just Add: A White Raven (main account)
or Hey its Sora (Smurf account)
im most likely to be online on one of these otherwise im not at home
Have a nice day and have fun playing!
